item.title: Roam
item.description: Here, at the very last day of 2019, I thought I should start a series of posts documenting some of the hobby projects I've created through the years. Most of them can be found on github, at least the ones that are in source code form. R O A M was a Hackweek project at SUSE, in which I wanted to implement a basic Minecraft-style landscape renderer in C. Source code available at github.
